pr_title: Get data stream accepts single search parameter

timeline.message: get data stream with single search parameter

timeline.bodyText:
This should be readOptionalString() instead of readString(), since the name maybe null.
This is also why I think the test fails.
timeline.author: martijnvg

timeline.bodyText: This should be writeOptionalString() instead of writeString()
timeline.author: martijnvg
martijnvg
martijnvg

timeline.bodyText: maybe also specify null as a value here?
timeline.author: martijnvg

replies.bodyText: maybe also randomly specify just "*" here?
replies.author: henningandersen

timeline.bodyText: I think there is a BWC issue here since the original code is in the 7.7 branch? Probably easiest to just make it 7.7 compatible here (and in the read above) rather than other workarounds.
timeline.author: henningandersen
henningandersen

timeline.bodyText:
I think we should add a bit more tests:

Get non existent data stream based on wildcard (which should return empty array).
Get data stream based on wildcard, returning multiple.
timeline.author: henningandersen
